Class BinderHandlerRegistration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turbogwt.mvp.databind.client.BinderHandlerRegistration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HandlerRegistration

    public class BinderHandlerRegistration
extends Object
implements HandlerRegistration
    A default HandlerRegistrarion implementation to be used by Binders.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static HandlerRegistration of(Binder binder,
                     String id,
                     HandlerRegistration... handlerRegistrations)
        Creates a BinderHandlerRegistration bound with other HandlerRegistrations. By the time of unbinding, all handlers will be removed.
        Parameters:
        binder - container
        id - identification of the binding
        handlerRegistrations - handlers to be chained removed
        Returns:
        the composite handler created

      • of

                     String id)

        Parameters:
        binder - container
        id - identification of the binding
        Returns:
        the handler created
